name: flexora
description: flexora is a digital platform built to bridge the gap between surplus food providers (like restaurants) and charities. The platform streamlines food donation, reduces waste, and helps combat hunger by ensuring food reaches those who need it most.
challenges: Ensuring pixel-perfect responsiveness across all devices and optimizing image loading for performance.
futurePlans: Add a blog section with a CMS.

name: mindHive
description: mindHive is a digital platform where students can -Share their thoughts and knowledge through articles. -Discover and read articles posted by others. -Participate in discussions through comments. -Like and appreciate valuable content. -Connect through academic interests and categories.
challenges: Integrating Stripe payment securely and managing complex state with Redux.
futurePlans: Implement wishlist functionality, articles reviews, and admin dashboard.

name: tastyNaste
description: tastyNest is a modern, responsive web application focused on delivering a delightful food experience online. Whether you want to explore new recipes, order tasty meals, or share your food adventures, tastyNest is your go-to platform!
challenges: Implementing real-time data sync with Firestore and optimizing authentication flow.
futurePlans: Add team collaboration features and calendar integration.
